dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-18 Sunphotometer Data over the SSA
title: BOREAS RSS-18 Sunphotometer Data over the SSA
summary: Ground-based sunphotometer data collected in support of AVIRIS remote sensing activities at the SSA. The following information was compiled by staff members of the BOReal Ecosystem-Atmosphere Study (BOREAS)Information System (BORIS) as part of their data documentation efforts.
